description.narrative: The ASEAN Australia Smart Cities initiative (AASCI) was annouced at the ASEAN Australia Special Summit in March 2018, as a AUD30 million investment over five years to support ASEAN Member States develop city systems in smart and sustainable ways. The AASCI includes several components: 10 Smart City Australia Awards; support for ASEAN's connectivity work; a smart cities accelerator; and a new partnership with the ADB for a ASEAN Australia Smart Cities Trust Fund (AASCTF). This investment (INN031) encompasses the AASCTF and associated program management costs (including an on-award enrichment activity for the smart city Australia Awardees). The expected outcome of the AASCTF is that: through the adoption and adaptation of digital solutions, systems and governance in participating ASEAN cities. The total value of this investment is $20.8 million to be expensed over 5 eyars, starting in 2018-19 financial year.
